column4: can someone tell me username and password for ubuntu live system?
why is this so difficult to login into live system??? :-(
there shouldnt be any "logging in" with a live system. The fact that your even there raises some questions, are you sure your booting from the cd and not the hard drive?
i'm sure, because i have suse on my hard drive. i downloaded ubuntu 8.04 desktop cd to test my hardware, it boots to gnome login, and i cannot login there
